content:
Thanks for your reply. I have another question, but it is not related to this topic.

Would it be possible to change the status of a collection to deaccession?

@Febin Sebastian E no, a collection cannot be deaccessioned. You are welcome to create an issue about this.

If it helps, you can delete a collection if you empty if first, by moving or deleting datasets from it.
Febin Sebastian E has marked this topic as resolved.
